name: audiobookshelf
description: Audiobook platform with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.dev: npm run db:start && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run migrate
